ctx: V Ukrajini poškodovana dva objekta z radioaktivnimi odpadki
content:
v tem nekolko zajebanem casu se spomnimo dveh pomembnih
rusov...

Vasili Aleksandrovich Arkhipov (30 January 1926 – 19 August 1998)
was a Soviet Navy officer credited with preventing a Soviet nuclear
strike (and, potentially, all-out nuclear war) during the Cuban
Missile Crisis. en.wikipedia.org/wik...y_Arkhipov


Stanislav Yevgrafovich Petrov (7 September 1939 – 19 May 2017) was
a lieutenant colonel of the Soviet Air Defence Forces who played a
key role in the 1983 Soviet nuclear false alarm incident en.wikipedia.org/wik...lav_Petrov
author: crt
